title: Sergio Frascoli
text:
Sergio Frascoli (born March 14, 1936 in <a href="San%20Giorgio%20su%20Legnano">San Giorgio su Legnano</a>) is a retired <a href="Italy">Italian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
He played 6 seasons (113 games, 4 goals) in the <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> for <a href="Aurora%20Pro%20Patria%201919">Aurora Pro Patria 1919</a>, <a href="S.S.C.%20Venezia">S.S.C. Venezia</a>, <a href="A.S.%20Roma">A.S. Roma</a> and <a href="SPAL%201907">SPAL 1907</a>.
